Articles.Content:
May she roam Minmus for as long as i don't blow her up in a horrible accident...

What a lovely vision she is.

Looking at this i think i may have built my very own hype train....

Nearly there!

Aaaaaand we landed....

How long till i flip it and kill the crew i wonder.....

Minmus and rovers = bad.

Trust me, I tried. Even with 6 orange fuel tanks, gravity was still so low it would bounce around and break stuff.

Minmus is best explored with a lander.
I know that now... still... it has the small rcs engines to hop around aswell fortunately, it was more of a test run as i knew minmus would be easy. Next, the Mun!!!

Minmus and rovers = bad.

Trust me, I tried. Even with 6 orange fuel tanks, gravity was still so low it would bounce around and break stuff.

Minmus is best explored with a lander.

I disagree, i drove 50km on Minmus with a heavy rover without any problem. It just depends of how is designed your rover and how you drive it

I disagree, i drove 50km on Minmus with a heavy rover without any problem. It just depends of how is designed your rover and how you drive it

I'd argue that I could take a lander and fly those 50km a whole lot faster and land before your rover was even 1/4 way. Landers are best on Minmus in just about every circumstance

Minmus and rovers = bad. Minmus is best explored with a lander.
Rover & Minimus = Kerbal death machine.

Your rover has the wrong name; Centa means one hundred in Latin/ Greek, Deca means 10.

Minmus and rovers = bad.

Trust me, I tried. Even with 6 orange fuel tanks, gravity was still so low it would bounce around and break stuff.

Minmus is best explored with a lander.

Clearly the contract disagrees with you.

Clearly the contract disagrees with you.

The contract does not know the first thing about science, let alone the board of inquiry responsible of the contract.
I may have broken the front wheels.....
